Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "System.IO.IOException: 'Entries cannot be opened multiple times in Update mode" (#909) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Issue with the OpenXml library

 	System.IO.Compression.dll!System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry.OpenInUpdateMode()
System.IO.Compression.dll!System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry.Open()
System.IO.Packaging.dll!System.IO.Packaging.ZipStreamManager.Open(System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry zipArchiveEntry, System.IO.FileMode streamFileMode, System.IO.FileAccess streamFileAccess)
System.IO.Packaging.dll!System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackagePart.GetStreamCore(System.IO.FileMode streamFileMode, System.IO.FileAccess streamFileAccess)
System.IO.Packaging.dll!System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream(System.IO.FileMode mode, System.IO.FileAccess access)
DocumentFormat.OpenXml.dll!DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging.OpenXmlPart.GetStream(System.IO.FileMode mode, System.IO.FileAccess access)
SpreadsheetLight.SLDocument.WriteDocumentProperties() 

**Description**
We receive the following exception :
System.IO.IOException: 'Entries cannot be opened multiple times in Update mode
.

**Information**

- .NET Target:  .NET Core
- DocumentFormat.OpenXml Version: (ie 2.12.3)
